nodes.text: The LSS 1000 Mark V Stun cuffs were a pair of handcuffs used to subdue prisoners. They were known as a more sophisticated version of the LSS 1000 Automatic Stun Cuffs.
In 137 ABY, Imperial pilot Gunn Yage apprehended the former Jedi Cade Skywalker in Mos Eisley on the desert planet Tatooine, and bound him with an LSS 1000 Mark V stun cuffs.
